solution_line_template: For breakfast, the family ate {total_slices} / {breakfast_divisor} = <<{total_slices}/{breakfast_divisor}={eaten_for_breakfast}>>{eaten_for_breakfast} slices of bread
After breakfast, the family has {total_slices} - {eaten_for_breakfast} = <<{total_slices}-{eaten_for_breakfast}={remaining_after_breakfast}>>{remaining_after_breakfast} slices of bread remaining.
After Neeley's lunch, there are {remaining_after_breakfast} - {lunch_slices} = <<{remaining_after_breakfast}-{lunch_slices}={remaining_after_lunch}>>{remaining_after_lunch} slices of bread remaining.
